snippet: People love Google Plus. Wait, they hate Google Plus. No, that's not right, either. Maybe the problem is that Google is like Microsoft. It has amazing engineers, but it has no sense of aesthetics. And today, design matters in tech.
abstract: People love Google Plus. Wait, they hate Google Plus. No, that's not right, either. Maybe the problem is that Google is like Microsoft. It has amazing engineers, but it has no sense of aesthetics. And today, design matters in tech.

headline.main: Is Google Plus's Problem One of Design?
